overview: Sweetheart Video's most glamorous series continues with Volume 3, where we find Nina Hartley struggling to keep the interest of bored, young Allie Haze. What Allie doesn't realize is that beneath Nina's elegant exterior is a sex-crazed lesbian who can show her the meaning of excitement. Allie again finds herself in a pickle with the legendary Teri Weigel, who suspects the young vixen has beening with her husband. The gorgeous superstar decides she should have dibbies on the young girl's body, and expertly doms pretty Allie into submission. Sara Stone, Melissa Monet, Sammy Grand and Deauxma also star in seductive tales of legendary beauties who can't resists a beautiful lesbian starlet.
title: Legends & Starlets 3
